handlers.code:
system.print("=== CHECKING _G.displays ===")

if _G.displays then
    system.print("SUCCESS: _G.displays is loaded!")
    
    local count = 0
    for slotName, config in pairs(_G.displays) do
        count = count + 1
        system.print("  Screen slot: " .. tostring(slotName))
        
        if config.tables then
            system.print("    Tables: " .. #config.tables)
        end
    end
    
    system.print("Total screens configured: " .. count)
    
    if count == 0 then
        system.print("")
        system.print("WARNING: _G.displays exists but is empty!")
        system.print("Make sure ore_pure_config.lua sets _G.displays[screen1]")
    end
else
    system.print("PROBLEM: _G.displays is NIL!")
    system.print("")
    system.print("This means ore_pure_config.lua is NOT loaded in a library slot.")
    system.print("")
    system.print("TO FIX:")
    system.print("1. On the PROGRAMMING BOARD (not screen)")
    system.print("2. Add ore_pure_config.lua to a LIBRARY SLOT")
    system.print("3. Library slot filter: onStart(), Slot Key: -5")
    system.print("4. This must load BEFORE the main display script")
end

unit.exit()
